div.p: Hi, my name is Scott Coval.
I'm the Director of Athletics at DeSales University.
I wanted to give you a brief overview of the Athletic Department
and opportunities you would have as an ACCESS student at DeSales.
Billera Hall is located at the West end of campus.
You will need a valid ID to enter Billera Hall.
Once inside Billera Hall, you'll find a lot of opportunities to play and to work out.
We have three recreation courts that you can use to play pick-up basketball or volleyball.
We have newly renovated fitness center with Nautilus equipment, free weights, tread mills,
elliptical machines, bicycles, rowers, anything you'll need to get a good workout.
The hours in Billera Hall are Monday - Thursday from 7:00am to 11:00pm.
And on the weekends, we're open from 10:00-6:00 on Saturday and from 2:00 - 10:00 on Sunday.
Along with Billera Hall, we have an all weather outdoor track.
Again, with a valid ID, you can get on the track and use the track.
We also have 6 very nice tennis courts that you can use as long as you have a valid student ID.
We want to wish you the very best on your classes, and certainly, we would welcome you
to come down to Billera Hall and check us out and see what we have
to offer here in the Athletic Department.
